attributes.action: Make it illegal for taxpayer pounds to be used by charities to fund lawyers to bring legal proceedings, on behalf of foreigners, against the UK.
attributes.additional_details: It is an obscenity that taxpayers who want to have people removed from this country then have to pay, through their taxes, lawyers to bring cases against the british people to have those deportations stopped.  Charities based and funded by the UK taxpayer should be legally obliged to spend ALL of the money they are given on UK citizens in UK based projects.
